Info Source: Attorney General Abbott Secures More Refunds for Auto Credit Insurance Buyers, States News Service, May 23, 2007 (via Nexis).

Company: American National Life Insurance Company of Texas
American National Property and Casualty Co.
Standard Life and Accident Insurance Company
AMERICAN NATIONAL INSURANCE CO. et al.

Description: Fine levied for using a rating rule of modification of a rating rule prior to filing it and issuing insurance contracts that were not in accordance with their filings then in effect. RCW 48.19.040(1); 48.19.040(6)
Agency: Washington State Office of the Insurance Commissioner

Description: American National Insurance agreed to pay $250,000 to resolve allegations that it had charged race-based premiums in the past.

Company: American National Property and Casualty Co.
AMERICAN NATIONAL PROPERTY AND CASUALTY COMPANY
Agency: Washington State Office of the Insurance Commissioner

Description: ANIC agreed to pay $120,000 in settlement of allegations in a Market Conduct Report that the company failed to file its stop-loss insurance forms with state regulators, misrepresented the stop-loss product as reinsurance, and collected stop-loss premiums without paying state premium tax.

Company: American National Life Insurance Company of Texas
Description: ANTEX agreed to pay $120,000 in settlement of allegations in a Market Conduct Report that the company failed to file its stop-loss insurance forms with state regulators, misrepresented the stop-loss product as reinsurance, and collected stop-loss premiums without paying state premium tax.

Agency: Washington State Office of the Insurance Commissioner
